entry.title: JET JQCC-7S - 7 Piece Quick Change Coupler Set 350213
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Quick Change Coupler Adaptors
Price: 181.17

[shortdesc]

7 PC Quick Change Coupler Set

  • Quick change feature snaps directly onto jaw type couplers – no need to remove hydraulic coupler to change accessories
  • Instantly converts jaw type couplers for fine line greasing for access to confined areas
  • Protective sleeve secures connection
  • Ideal for applications where fittings are in hard-to-reach areas
  • For hand operated grease guns
  • Set contains one each:
  • Recessed lube adaptor (350208)
  • Angle lube adaptor (350209)
  • Needle nose adaptor (350210)
  • Right angle coupler (350211)
  • Seal off dispenser (350212)
  • Grease injector needle (350206)
  • 12" flexible hose (350201)
  • Terylene pouch
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Product Type Quick Change Coupler Adaptors

    Extra Product Information

  • Quick change feature snaps directly onto jaw type couplers - no need to remove hydraulic coupler to change accessories

Pump Float Switch 0.5 HP

entry.title: JET R400-115 - 1/2 Hp Submersible Pump 290771
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Submersible Pumps
Price: 841.74

[shortdesc]

1/2 HP Submersible Pump

  • Ideal for dewatering constructions sites, mines, circulating fountain water, or for all around use in industrial plants and utilities
  • Top discharge – allows for superior cooling of motor and provides a slim line design
  • Longer power cord – standard 33' power cord
  • 304 Stainless steel motor housing – superior abrasion resistance will not wear out like aluminum motor housings when pumping sandy water
  • Three seal motor protection - motor is protected by double mechanical seals
  • Lower seal made of silicon carbide and upper seal is made of carbon/ceramic
  • An additional lip seal has been installed above the impeller, to help prevent abrasives such as dirt, silt or sand, from entering into the seal chamber
  • More motor protection – winding protection and (NEMA) Class F motor insulation allows motor temperature to raise to 230°F, superior to pumps with Class A and B insulation
  • Automatic switch turns pump motor off if temperature and/or amp draw raises too high
  • When the motor cools the switch will automatically reset and the pump will turn back on
  • Tough pump construction – hardened cast iron stands up to rough handling and pumping sandy water unlike pumps with soft resin impellers or plastic exterior components
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Frequency 60
    HP 0.5
    Product Type Submersible Pumps
    Size 15mm

    Extra Product Information

  • Ideal for dewatering constructions sites, mines, circulating fountain water, or for all around use in industrial plants and utilities
  • Top discharge – allows for superior cooling of motor and provides a slim line design
  • Longer power cord – standard 33' p

entry.title: JET SV400-115 - 1/2 Hp Submersible Trash Pump 290784
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Submersible Pumps
Price: 933.98

[shortdesc]

1/2 HP Submersible Trash Pump

  • Equipped with Vortex impellers, undoubtedly the best non-clog impellers ever invented for the handling of mud, raw sewage, viscous liquids, rags, wood chips and other solids
  • They pass solid up to 90% of pump outlet diameter
  • Longer power cord – standard 33' power cord
  • 304 Stainless Steel motor housing – superior abrasion resistance will not wear out like aluminum motor housings when pumping sandy water
  • Three seal motor protection - motor is protected by double mechanical seals
  • Lower seal made of silicon carbide and upper seal is made of carbon/ceramic
  • An additional lip seal has been installed above the impeller, to help prevent abrasives such as dirt, silt or sand, from entering into the seal chamber
  • More motor protection – winding protection and (NEMA) Class F motor insulation allows motor temperature to raise to 230°F, superior to pumps with Class A and B insulation
  • Automatic switch turns pump motor off if temperature and/or amp draw raises too high
  • When the motor cools the switch will automatically reset and the pump will turn back on
  • Tough pump construction – hardened cast iron stands up to rough handling and pumping sandy water unlike pumps with soft resin impellers or plastic exterior components
    • [/shortdesc]

    Frequency 60
    HP 0.5
